scripts.dev:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production PORT=4000 next dev
scripts.dev:sandbox: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=sandbox PORT=4001 next dev
scripts.dev:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development PORT=4002 next dev
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production PORT=4000 next start
scripts.start:prod: cross-env NODE_ENV=production APP_ENV=production PORT=4000 next start
scripts.start:sandbox: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=sandbox PORT=4001 next start
scripts.start:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development APP_ENV=development PORT=4002 next start
scripts.deploy-full: start cmd /k "npm start" && timeout /t 5 && npm run deploy
